Infographics

#photos { /* Prevent vertical gaps */ line-height: 0;

-webkit-column-count: 5; -webkit-column-gap: 0px; -moz-column-count: 5; -moz-column-gap: 0px; column-count: 5; column-gap: 0px;
}

#photos img { /* Just in case there are inline attributes */ width: 100% !important; height: auto !important; }

@media (max-width: 1200px) { #photos { -moz-column-count: 4; -webkit-column-count: 4; column-count: 4; } } @media (max-width: 1000px) { #photos { -moz-column-count: 3; -webkit-column-count: 3; column-count: 3; } } @media (max-width: 800px) { #photos { -moz-column-count: 2; -webkit-column-count: 2; column-count: 2; } } @media (max-width: 400px) { #photos { -moz-column-count: 1; -webkit-column-count: 1; column-count: 1; } }

</a>
